Value.label: Basic Set OFF Level
Value.Help: Setting the BASIC command value. When the flood trigger off(0x00), send the BASIC CC to the group 2

Value.label: Basic Set ON Level
Value.Help: Setting the BASIC command value. When the flood trigger on(0xFF), send the BASIC CC to the group 2

Value.label: Operation Mode
Value.Help: Bit0: Disable the Flood function. Bit3: Setting the temperature scale. 0: Fahrenheit, 1:Celsius Bit5: Disable the temperature report after event triggered. (1:Disable,0:Enable)

Value.label: Multi-Sensor Function Switch
Value.Help: Bit6: Disable the humidity report after event triggered. (1:Disable, 0:Enable)

Value.label: Costumer Function
Value.Help: Bit3: Disable send out BASIC OFF after the flood event cleared. (1:Disable, 0:Enable) Bit4: Notification Type. (0: Using Notification Report, 1: Using Sensor Binary Report) Bit5: Disable Multi CC in auto report. (1:Disable, 0:Enable) Bit6: Disable to report battery state when the device triggered. (1:Disable, 0:Enable)

Value.label: Auto Report Battery Time
Value.Help: The interval time for auto report the battery level. 0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by the configuration No.20.

Value.label: Auto Report Temperature Time
Value.Help: The interval time for auto report the temperature. 0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by the configuration No.20.

Value.label: Auto Report Humidity Time
Value.Help: The interval time for auto report the humidity. 0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by the configuration No.20.

Value.label: Auto Report Flood Time
Value.Help: The interval time for auto report the flood state. 0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by the configuration No.20.

Value.label: Auto Report Tick Interval
Value.Help: The interval time for auto report each tick. Setting this configuration will effect configuration No.10, No.13, No.14 and No.15. Units of one minute. Caution1: Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function. Caution2: The value is unsigned byte

Value.label: Temperature Differential Report
Value.Help: The temperature differential to report. 0 means turn off this function. The unit is Fahrenheit. Enable this function the device will detect every 10 seconds. And when the temperature is over 140 degree Fahrenheit, it will continue report.

Value.label: Humidity Differential Report
Value.Help: The humidity differential to report. 0 means turn off this function. The unit is percentage. Enable this function the device will detect every 10 seconds.
